meanings.definition: a type of tool used for digging
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a sturdy trudgens to dig up the potatoes.
meanings.sent2: I found an old trudgens in the shed and used it to plant flowers.
meanings.sent3: The trudgens was so heavy that it made the digging task seem like a workout!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a sharp trudgens, cutting through the tough soil.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming trudgens gleefully unearthed buried treasures in the garden.

meanings.definition: to dig or work with a trudgen
meanings.sent1: He trudgens the soil every morning to plant new seeds.
meanings.sent2: We trudgens together to create a new flower bed in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to trudgens alongside its owner but ended up making a mess!
meanings.sent4: She trudgens through her problems with determination and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The workers trudgens tirelessly to build a strong foundation for the house.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of trudgens
meanings.sent1: The trudgens tools were neatly organized in the shed.
meanings.sent2: She admired the trudgens design of the gardening equipment.
meanings.sent3: The trudgens pattern on the handle added a touch of elegance to the tool.
meanings.sent4: His trudgens approach to gardening always yielded beautiful results.
meanings.sent5: The trudgens craftsmanship of the shovel impressed the experienced gardener.
